alert.note: Alert for Beaver (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued March 04 at 4:10AM CST until March 05 at 7:00PM CST by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR BEAVER COUNTY... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IS CANCELLED FOR TODAY FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR THE EASTERN OKLAHOMA PANHANDLE... The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a Fire Weather Watch for strong winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from Saturday morning through Saturday evening. The Fire Weather Watch has been cancelled for today. * Affected Area...In Oklahoma...Beaver. * 20 Foot Winds...Southwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 11 percent. * Red Flag Threat Index...3 to 5. * Timing...10 AM to 7 PM CST Saturday.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that the potential for critical fire weather conditions exists. Listen for later forecasts and possible red flag warnings.
